snippet: The documentary “Brothers on the Line,” tells how Victor Reuther and his brothers Walter and Roy built the United Auto Workers into the nation’s most powerful union.
abstract: Sasha Reuther documentary Brothers on the Line recounts how his grandfather Victor and his brothers Walter and Roy built up the United Auto Workers into what was for decades the nation's most powerful labor union; film will be shown as part of the IFC Center's Stranger Than Fiction series.
lead_paragraph: The documentary “Brothers on the Line,” tells how Victor Reuther and his brothers Walter and Roy built the United Auto Workers into the nation’s most powerful union.

headline.seo: ‘Brothers on the Line,’ Sasha Reuther’s Film on the U.A.W.
headline.main: Telling the Story of His Family, and of a Union
headline.print_headline: Telling the Story Of His Family, And of a Union
